moves.name: Blast Burn
moves.effect: The user cannot act on the next turn.

moves.name: Blaze Kick
moves.effect: High critical hit ratio. On a successful hit, roll 1d6. On a 6, the target is Burned.

moves.name: Blue Flare
moves.effect: On a successful hit, roll 1d6. On a 5 or 6, the target is Burned.

moves.name: Burn Up
moves.effect: After using this move, the user loses its Fire typing for the rest of the scene.

moves.name: Ember
moves.effect: On a successful hit, roll 1d6. On a 6, the target is Burned.

moves.name: Eruption
moves.effect: This move's damage is reduced proportionally to the user's remaining HP.

moves.name: Fiery Dance
moves.effect: On a successful hit, the user's Special is raised by 1.

moves.name: Fire Blast
moves.effect: This move has a high chance of missing. On a roll of 1 or 2 on any die, that die is a failure. On a successful hit, roll 1d6. On a 6, the target is Burned.

moves.name: Fire Fang
moves.effect: On a successful hit, roll 1d6. On a 6, the target is Burned or Flinches.

moves.name: Fire Lash
moves.effect: On a successful hit, the target's Vitality is lowered by 1.

moves.name: Fire Pledge
moves.effect: If used after Grass Pledge, creates a sea of fire on the battlefield. If used before Water Pledge, creates a rainbow.

moves.name: Fire Punch
moves.effect: On a successful hit, roll 1d6. On a 6, the target is Burned.

moves.name: Fire Spin
moves.effect: The target is trapped and takes damage for 1d4+1 rounds.

moves.name: Flame Burst
moves.effect: Hits all adjacent opponents.

moves.name: Flame Charge
moves.effect: On a successful hit, the user's Dexterity is raised by 1.

moves.name: Flame Wheel
moves.effect: On a successful hit, roll 1d6. On a 6, the target is Burned. May thaw the user if frozen.

moves.name: Flamethrower
moves.effect: On a successful hit, roll 1d6. On a 6, the target is Burned.

moves.name: Flare Blitz
moves.effect: The user takes recoil damage equal to one-third of the damage it deals. On a successful hit, roll 1d6. On a 6, the target is Burned.

moves.name: Heat Crash
moves.effect: Damage depends on the weight difference between the user and the target.

moves.name: Heat Wave
moves.effect: Hits all adjacent opponents. On a successful hit, roll 1d6. On a 6, the target is Burned.

moves.name: Incinerate
moves.effect: If the target is holding a Berry, it is destroyed.

moves.name: Inferno
moves.effect: This move has a high chance of missing. On a roll of 1, 2 or 3 on any die, that die is a failure. Always Burns the target on a successful hit.

moves.name: Lava Plume
moves.effect: Hits all Pok√©mon on the field. On a successful hit, roll 1d6. On a 5 or 6, the target is Burned.

moves.name: Magma Storm
moves.effect: The target is trapped and takes damage for 1d4+1 rounds.

moves.name: Mystical Fire
moves.effect: On a successful hit, the target's Special is lowered by 1.

moves.name: Overheat
moves.effect: After use, the user's Special is lowered by 2 for the rest of the scene.

moves.name: Pyro Ball
moves.effect: On a successful hit, roll 1d6. On a 6, the target is Burned.

moves.name: Sacred Fire
moves.effect: On a successful hit, roll 1d6. On a 5 or 6, the target is Burned. May thaw the user if frozen.

moves.name: Searing Shot
moves.effect: Hits all adjacent opponents. On a successful hit, roll 1d6. On a 5 or 6, the target is Burned.

moves.name: Sunny Day
moves.effect: Changes the weather to Sunny Weather for 5 rounds.

moves.name: Will-O-Wisp
moves.effect: The target is Burned.
